column2: "...Well, it seems our little conversation about the outside world has brought us here."
"The [Profound Darkness] will be revived. Let me put it as bluntly as I can: Your annihilation is inevitable."

"If you return to that world, only suffering and anguish will await you.
...Do you still wish to go back?"

"There's somewhere we belong...
And it's not here."
"...Then you should leave. This is where this universe ends."
"Pick up Clarissa and gather your power. Just like when you defeat and devour Darkers."
"It's impossible for me, but possible for you. You are, after all, ARKS."
"Now go, and enjoy that uncertain world as much as you can."
